author: icyJoseph
message:
docs: `htmlLimitedBots` config value should be a RegExp (#79454)

Closes: https://linear.app/vercel/issue/DOC-4697/htmllimitedbots-value

Also fixes `Behavior` sub heading

files.patch:
@@ -1152,7 +1152,7 @@ ReactDOM.prefetchDNS(href: string)
 > - These methods are currently only supported in Client Components, which are still Server Side Rendered on initial page load.
 > - Next.js in-built features such as `next/font`, `next/image` and `next/script` automatically handle relevant resource hints.
 
-##Â Behavior
+## Behavior
 
 ### Default Fields
 
@@ -1182,15 +1182,15 @@ If you need to customize this list, you can define them manually using the `html
 import type { NextConfig } from 'next'
 
 const config: NextConfig = {
-  htmlLimitedBots: 'MySpecialBot|MyAnotherSpecialBot|SimpleCrawler',
+  htmlLimitedBots: /MySpecialBot|MyAnotherSpecialBot|SimpleCrawler/,
 }
 
 export default config
 ```
 
 ```js filename="next.config.js" switcher
 module.exports = {
-  htmlLimitedBots: 'MySpecialBot|MyAnotherSpecialBot|SimpleCrawler',
+  htmlLimitedBots: /MySpecialBot|MyAnotherSpecialBot|SimpleCrawler/,
 }
 ```

@@ -9,15 +9,15 @@ The `htmlLimitedBots` config allows you to specify a list of user agents that sh
 import type { NextConfig } from 'next'
 
 const config: NextConfig = {
-  htmlLimitedBots: 'MySpecialBot|MyAnotherSpecialBot|SimpleCrawler',
+  htmlLimitedBots: /MySpecialBot|MyAnotherSpecialBot|SimpleCrawler/,
 }
 
 export default config
 ```
 
 ```js filename="next.config.js" switcher
 module.exports = {
-  htmlLimitedBots: 'MySpecialBot|MyAnotherSpecialBot|SimpleCrawler',
+  htmlLimitedBots: /MySpecialBot|MyAnotherSpecialBot|SimpleCrawler/,
 }
 ```
